description: Expose your rebellious spirit, but don’t get slapped with any charges. These striped, crew height, Merino Wool socks deliver all-day comfort, a fit that keeps you covered, and durability for the long haul. Maybe you need a dress sock, maybe you just need the best fitting sock you can find. Either way, these stripes are no flash in the pan.
name: Darn Tough Socks Flash Stripe Crew Lightweight Socks - Mens
